meanings.definition: The coarse part of flax or hemp that remains after the fiber has been removed.
meanings.sent1: The hurds left after extracting the fibers were used for insulation.
meanings.sent2: The farmer collected the hurds to repurpose them for gardening.
meanings.sent3: The hurds decided to have a party while the fibers were away.
meanings.sent4: The hurds stood strong, supporting the fibers until the end.
meanings.sent5: The hurds resembled a tangled web of strength and resilience.

meanings.definition: A mass of soft or fibrous material used for padding or stuffing.
meanings.sent1: The pillow was filled with soft hurds for extra comfort.
meanings.sent2: She used the hurds to stuff the teddy bear she was making.
meanings.sent3: The hurds giggled as they bounced around in the pillow fight.
meanings.sent4: The hurds embraced each other tightly, forming a cozy nest.
meanings.sent5: The hurds whispered secrets of comfort and warmth to the teddy bear.
